properties.name: 287 Sprint
properties.description: Posted by Nuttyright From Ridgedale to 287, drivers sprint, changing lanes without using turn signals or any regard for those they cut-off! Mostly BMW, Lexus, Mercedes a-holes in a rush to their important jobs.

properties.name: Car Noise
properties.description: Posted by Railpassdepot Idiots with thier radios blasting and bass systems thumping and pumping! Especially a red Dodge Magnum. One attempt to tell the Magnum driver resulted in a death threat, but the police could do nothing about it!

properties.name: Crazy Merge
properties.description: Posted by Nuttyright Drivers from New Morris Ave. and those exiting 287 race like hell to get into the right-hand lane. Law of gross tonage and best insured applies, not a Yield sign!

properties.name: Day Laborer X-ing
properties.description: Posted by Railpassdepot Morristown train station and Morris Street are packed with Day Laborers every morning, six days a week. And, they always seem to be crossing the street, back and forth, to and from teh train station. Add to that the dozens of contractors stopping to pick up cheap labor for the day with their bigass F150 pickup trucks and vans.

properties.name: Double-Parked on The Green
properties.description: Posted by Railpassdepot Assholes going into RiteAid and the banks never circle The Green if parking is full. They just double-park with their blinkers on or an idiot sitting in the car. This blocks an already conjested and crazy stretch of raod in Morristown. I hardly ever see the police writing tickets here! Why?

properties.name: Hazardous Driving
properties.description: Posted by Railpassdepot The cars coming up Water St. do three (3) hazardous moves, never caught by police: 1) despite a clear sign forbidding it, they constantly make the right-on-red, 2) they run the red light and never clear the light for people turning left from E. Park onto N. Park, and 3) some stupid asses line up in the right lane (marked right-turn only!) and then go straight toward N. Park and squeeze the car to the left, out of their lane. Never any tickets being written here either!!!

properties.name: Hazardous Traffic Light
properties.description: Posted by Morristownnj The traffic light for vehicles exiting Western onto Washington turns red at the same time lights on Washington turn green. In addition, the stop line for the car on Western is 15 feet or more from the light and on a downhill slope. Therefore, vehicles from Western are always running the red and vehicles on Washington are starting out into the intersection on their green light at the same time. WHY can\'t this be changed? It just takes one human to observe for 10 minutes, see the problem and make a change in the timing of the lights!

properties.name: Karl's Auto Body
properties.description: Posted by Nuttyright In this town, these guys are saviors! Great service and prices! Reliable and honest!

properties.name: Left-Lane Cuts
properties.description: Posted by Nuttyright Every morning, without fail, a driver pulls up to the light, down the left mot lane (skipping by all the drivers in adjacent lane) only to cut over into the proper lane in the middle of the turn. Only ONCE have I seen a car get pulled over for this, because the police car was one car back and I layed on my horn like a mad man!

properties.name: Morristown Police Dept.
properties.description: Posted by Nuttyright 200 South Street, Morristown, NJ

properties.name: Rude Mendham A-Holes
properties.description: Posted by Nuttyright Driver from Mendham, travel to or through Morristown, block this intersection every morning for those entering 24 from Phoenix and or Atno. Once I saw two police car, the officers talking, as they sat in an adjacent parking lot and neither did a thing about it.

properties.name: Staples Parking Lot
properties.description: Posted by Nuttyright DO NOT PARK HERE FOR A TRAIN!!! Made the mistake of parking here once on a Saturday and came back at 2AM, with a tired, cold wife only to find my car missing (towed away)! I had to submit to legal blackmail and pay 00 cash to get my car back the next day in some muddy lot in Morris Township, only to find that they had damaged the front end in the process. Call 908-464-6408 and ask the tow ass!

properties.name: Tito Barrito
properties.description: Posted by Nuttyright The best barritos I\'ve ever had and good, hot salsa. Highly recommended.
